Package edu.monash.fit2099.bids

Class BidsManager

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.bids.BidsManager
public class BidsManager
extends java.lang.Object
The BidsManager class is used to store the buyer and bid into a HashMap
See Also:
Bid, Buyer, BidException

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private java.util.ArrayList<Bid> bidList

    Create a HashMap with String key and Bid value

      public void setOffer​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​Bid> offer)
      A method for other classes to invoke it in order to set the HashMap

    • addBid

      public void addBid​(java.lang.String buyerID, int bidPrice, java.lang.String bidDate)
      A method that add new bid by creating Bid class instance and Buyer class instance
      Parameters:
      buyerID - A String buyerID that placed the Bid
      bidPrice - A Integer bidPrice that placed by the Buyer
      bidDate - A String bidDate that placed by the Buyer

    • removeBid

      public void removeBid​(java.lang.String buyerID, java.lang.String bidID)
      To remove the bid for particular vehicle
      Parameters:
      buyerID - The buyer that place the bid for the vehicle
      bidID - The bid that placed by the buyer

    • bestBid

      public void bestBid()
      To return the best bid for the particular vehicle

    • worstBid

      public void worstBid()
      To return the worst bid for the particular vehicle

    • description

      public java.lang.String description()
      To output the description of the added Bid by using the HashMap key and invoke the description method in Bid class
      Returns:
      A String output
